metadata.title: Thursday, 20th June, 2013
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    when the Government will complete procuring furniture and other hospital equipment for Chisengi Sengi Rural Health Centre; and
(b)    when the construction of another residential house at the Rural Health Centre will commence.
(a)    when the Government will complete constructing Kamapanda and Kambimba border posts in Mwinilunga District;
(b)    what the contract period for construction of the border posts is;
(c)    what the contract sum for the project is; and
(d)    how much money had been paid to the contractor as of December, 2012.

questions.minister: Vice President whether the Government has any plans of transforming Nangoma Parliamentary Constituency into a district.
Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education what plans the Government has for electrifying all the schools in the country.
Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    how many kilometres of the Kasama-Mporokoso Road were tarred as of March, 2013;
(b)    how many kilometres of bush clearing had been done; and
(c)    when the tarrying project will be completed.

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development, Mother and Child Health
parts: (a)    when the Ministry will reconstruct the roofs of its housing units that were blown off in November, 2012 at Chikenge and Kawanda in Kabompo District; and
(b)    whether there are any plans to rehabilitate the housing units which are in a dilapidated state at Chikokwelo and Manyinga in Kabompo District.
(a)    how many people died of the following cancer diseases from January, 2011 to March, 2013:
(b)    why breast cancer could not be vaccinated against in Zambia as of 2012.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication which projects were implemented with the support of the French Agency for Development from 2011 to 2012, year by year.

parts: (a)    when Luwi Mission Hospital will be upgraded to a referral hospital; and
(b)    when the Government will send additional health workers to the Hospital.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    what has caused the delay in completing the construction of the 1 x 2 classroom blocks at Ng’ombe and Nene Primary Schools in Sikongo Parliamentary Constituency; and
(b)    when the construction works above will be completed.
